column4: hi.. i just installed 11.10, is there a package manager already installed by default?
I actually have the 4311 as well, and I just got it  to work
do you have the STA driver installed from "Additional Drivers" ?
can i download it to a flashdrive and install from that?
you don't want the STA driver, you want the b34 driver
go to Applications -> Settings -> Additional Drivers
is the STA driver both present and "activated"? it will have a green circle if it is activated.
it only says No proprietary drivers are installed
then reboot, and hopefully your card should "just work"
I just did this about an hour ago
ok, but my only option is to connect via ethernet at this point?
yes, you will need to connect via ethernet
